page.title: 07AN AVERAGE FARM IN CLOUGHCOR
page.content: THIS FARMER HAS 88 ACRES OF LAND.HE HAS 50 ACRES OF GRASSLAND AND HE GROWS SOME BARLEY AND POTATOES.HE KEEPS 40 BEEF CATTLE AND 100 SHEEP.HE RENTS A FUTHER 13 ACRES AND USES QUITE A LOT OF MACHINERY.HE BUYS AND SELLS HIS ANIMALS,THE CATTLE BEING TAKEN AWAY AND KILLED FOR BEEF.SILAGE,BARLEY AND NUTS ARE USED FOR FEEDING THE ANIMALS. THE FOOD IS KEPT IN A SILAGE PIT AND A BARLEY BIN.THERE ARE OTHER BUILDINGS ON THE FARM SUCH AS BARLEY,STRAW AND CATTLE SHEDS.HE AND HIS WIFE AND TWO SONS LIVE IN THE FARM HOUSE.BOTH SONS ARE INTERESTED IN FARMING.
